title: Conga Leader

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Add a player to the end of your  Conga Line.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You start as the first person in the Conga Line.
- Any investigative abilities used on any members of the Conga Line will instead inform what position of the Conga Line that member is.
- When a member of the Conga Line dies, their role will appear as the first member of the Conga Line, and with each death itâ€™ll go down the list.
- If members of the Conga Line try to use abilities on you, they will secretly fail

desc:
Post 630
*Conga, conga, con-ga! Don't you just wanna join in?*
